simulator

Class SimulatorRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.SimulatorRegister

  • public class SimulatorRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    A register in the CPU simulator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SimulatorRegister(int registerSize, int registerNumber)
